product_name: Cordillera Down Mule Slippers - Women's - 2012 Special Buy
long_description: Slip your feet into the Cordillera Down Mule slippers for coziness at the cabin or around the campsite. Sturdy nylon fabric surrounds duck down to keep feet warm through the winter. Polyester linings wick moisture away, reducing sweaty condensation inside. EVA foam insoles offer cushioning underfoot. Nylon outsoles provide gentle traction. Special buy.
short_description: Slip your feet into the Cordillera Down Mule slippers for coziness at the cabin or around the campsite.
